sentence.Network_en: The new mayor is broad - minded and liberal about things.
sentence.Network_cn: 新市长胸襟开阔,思想开明.

sentence.Network_en: Why, George Babbitt , you're about as broad - minded and liberal as a razor - blade.
sentence.Network_cn: 嘿, 乔治·巴比特, 你跟剃刀口那么宽宏大量,通情达理.

sentence.Network_en: My broad - minded grand - uncle tried his best to make a match of it but did not succeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 放佚风流的叔祖虽从中尽力撮合周旋,但当时究未成功.

entry.tran: 心胸开阔的；开明的；宽宏大量的
entry.def: If you describe someone as broad-minded, you approve of them because they are willing to accept types of behaviour which other people consider immoral.

example.tran: 公正无私、心胸开阔的人

means.word_mean: 2. inclined to respect views and beliefs that differ from your own;

sentences.sentence: "a judge who is broad-minded but even-handed"
